explanation: [0-0] A person dressed in black is standing on a wooden board, holding a red apple in their right hand. In front of the wooden board is a lake, with a wooden stake in front of the person in black and a fox.

[0-4] Afterward, three icons appear at the top of the screen: an apple, a watermelon, and a banana. The person in black then takes a bite of the apple in their right hand. Next, the person in black runs forward on the wooden board, still holding the apple. The person then jumps onto the wooden stake in the lake. Subsequently, the area around the apple icon at the top of the screen turns green, and the word "WOOOAH" appears on the screen in white letters.
